data.description:
Rampage Agents is a VR game that includes hero shooting battle royale and multiplayer cooperative adventure gameplay. Players will take control of increasingly diverse and powerful superhuman agents, form tactical squads with friends, and fight together!

# ðŸŽ® Battle Royale Mode:

Create your tactic squad and utilize your hero skill, weapon and items to ensure your survival. Become the last one standing in the massive map.

**- KEY FEATURES:**

**ðŸ”¥Diverse Tactical Skills. Not just for expert shooters!**
{1172227790730931}

**ðŸ”¥Over 100 different items and various weapons. Each weapon has its own unique ability.**
{534777948978375}

# ðŸŽ® Adventure Mode:(Over 12 hours of content, multiplayer mode requires the purchase of the Multiplayer Adventure Expansion Pack)

Fused with Roguelite elements and dynamic tactical options, you can play as different agents with different skill sets in procedurally-generated stages with random loots. Find the right weapon & chip combo and level up the skills to create a unique build among tens of thousands of possible combinations.

**- KEY FEATURES:**

**ðŸ”¥FPS+Roguelite+RPG combined gameplay, construct diverse Build through death cycle for different experience**
{3642544069296121}

**ðŸ”¥Many heroes and multiple game plus with different game mechanisms**
{421570060918106}

**ðŸ”¥Dozens of personalized dyes available to customize your skin**
{1598239044370037}{1020843839176652}

changelog.change_log: This update adds English voice acting for characters in Battle Royale mode, reworks the Grapple system, introduces new features for adjusting the grip angle and offhand influence, launches a series of Chinese New Year themed featured skins, and fixes and optimizes a host of issues!

This update optimized the gun-holding angle and fixed a range of bugs!

We hope you will provide us with feedback and suggestions after experiencing this update, as we will continue to iterate and optimize.
This update will significantly improve the game's framerate, comprehensively enhance the gunplay experience, and fix and optimize a series of bugs!
